Articles.Content:
Hi !

Is there an easy way to get a space center building level (in my case the Tracking station), or do I need to read this by reading the save persistent file as a ConfigNode ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-31T12:18:47Z" title="08/31/2015 12:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 31, 2015</time> by simon56modder**
